hours_text:
# Visit

MCASB is a non-collecting contemporary art museum located in the heart of downtown Santa Barbara in Paseo Nuevo, serving Santa Barbara and the Central Coast with 3-5 exhibitions and 30+ educational programs each year.

The museum is closed between exhibitions for deinstallation and installation of each exhibition. We encourage you to check our exhibition calendar online to ensure a visit when the Museum is open to the public.

_Museum of Contemporary Art Santa Barbara advances creativity and inspires critical thinking through meaningful engagement with the art of our time._

### Address

**Museum of Contemporary Art Santa Barbara**  
**Paseo Nuevo Upper Arts Terrace**  
**653 Paseo Nuevo**  
**Santa Barbara, CA 93101**

MCASB is located on the Paseo Nuevo Upper Arts Terrace, above Eureka. Use the tiled stairs facing Chapala Street to access our Main Entrance. The elevator is located to the left of Panda Express at street level. Take elevator up to Upper Arts Terrace, Level 2.

Enter the Paseo Nuevo parking lot on Chapala Street at Ortega Street. Once past the gate turn left, then right, and proceed all the way to the roof top level. You will see the corridor to the Museum Main Entrance on the right at the far end of the lot.

### General Inquiries

**E** __ [hello@mcasantabarbara.org](mailto:hello@mcasantabarbara.org)

_**MCASB does not accept unsolicited artist materials.**_

### Hours

(Special Winter Hours)

**Sunday:** | 11am-6pm  
---|---  
**Monday:** | CLOSED ...

collections_text:
On View October 5, 2025 - April 26, 2026 DJ Javier:  
_San Milano Drive_ On View November 2, 2025 - April 12, 2026 Godofredo Astudillo â€“   
_Makahiya: I wanted you to feel the same_

## MCASB is temporarily closed for installation. Please join us to celebrate [_DJ Javier: San Milano Drive_](https://www.mcasantabarbara.org/exhibition/djjavier/) on Sunday, October 5, 2025, from 12:00 - 4:00 pm.

## Please visit MCASB Satellite at The Riviera Beach House, 121 State Street, to enjoy our current exhibition[ _In Motion: Marie McKenzie & Marlene Struss_](https://www.mcasantabarbara.org/exhibition/in-motion-marie-mckenzie-marlene-struss/).

### Hours

(Special Winter Hours)  
---  
**Tuesday:** | Closed  
**Wednesday:** | 11am-6pm  
**Thursday:** | 11am-6pm  
**Friday:** | 11am-6pm  
**Saturday:** | 11am-6pm  
**Sunday:** | 11am-6pm  
**Monday:** | Closed  
  
_CLOSED for Lunch everyday from_ _2pm-2:30pm_

[Visit](https://www.mcasantabarbara.org/visit/)

MCASB is a non-collecting contemporary art museum. Exhibitions at the Main Space location rotate three times annually and are typically on view for fourteen weeks. Visitors are encouraged to check the exhibition calendar to ensure a visit when the Museum is open to the public. 

[More Info](https://www.mcasantabarbara.org/visit/)

[Engage](https://www.mcasantabarbara.org/engage/)

MCASB focuses on audience development and visitor experience through four platforms of engagement: Community, Diversity, Experimentation, and Arts Outreach...
